org.daisy.common.xproc.calabash

Interface XProcStep

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.daisy.common.transform.XMLTransformer, com.xmlcalabash.core.XProcRunnable, com.xmlcalabash.core.XProcStep

    public interface XProcStep
extends com.xmlcalabash.core.XProcStep, org.daisy.common.transform.XMLTransformer
    XProcStep that also implements the XMLTransformer API.
